00396 class KviIconManager;
00397 
00398 class KVIRC_API KviCachedPixmap
00399 {
00400 public:
00401         // the pixmap MUST be allocated with new QPixmap()
00402         // this calss takes the ownership
00403         KviCachedPixmap(QPixmap * ptr,const QString &szPath);
00404         ~KviCachedPixmap();
00405 private:
00406         QString      m_szPath;
00407         kvi_time_t   m_tLastAccess;
00408         QPixmap    * m_pPixmap;
00409         unsigned int m_uSize;
00410 public:
00411         QPixmap       * pixmap(){ return m_pPixmap; };
00412         const QString & path(){ return m_szPath; };
00413         unsigned int    size(){ return m_uSize; };
00414         kvi_time_t      lastAccessTime(){ return m_tLastAccess; };
00415         void            updateLastAccessTime();
00416 };
00417 
00418 class KVIRC_API KviIconWidget : public QWidget
00419 {
00420         Q_OBJECT
00421 public:
00422         KviIconWidget();
00423         KviIconWidget(QWidget * par);
00424         ~KviIconWidget();
00425 protected:
00426         void init();
00427         virtual void closeEvent(QCloseEvent *e);
00428         virtual bool eventFilter(QObject * o,QEvent *e);
00429 signals:
00430         void closed();
00431         void selected(int iIcon);
00432 };
00433 
00434 
00435 
00436 //
00437 // This class manages the images used by KVIrc.
00438 //
00439 // We handle three types of images: builtin small icons, builtin big icons and generic images.
00440 //
00441 // The builtin small icons are in the pics/coresmall directory (this is to optimize the directory size
00442 //      since it's a linear search...), are 16x16 in size and are indexed by numbers in a way that their
00443 //      access is really fast. The icons used here are used mostly in KviIrcView (but not exclusively).
00444 //
00445 // The generic images are just "any" image that the underlying Qt engine
00446 //      is able to load. They are loaded by (relative) path and
00447 //      cached by name.
00448 //
00449 // The builtin big icons are (actually) just generic images
00450 //      that are eventually scaled to 32x32 if needed. One can request
00451 //      a builtin small icon indexed by number to be scaled
00452 //      to the size of 32x32 as a big icon too.
00453 //
00454 
00455 class KVIRC_API KviIconManager : public QObject
00456 {
00457         Q_OBJECT
00458 public:
00459         KviIconManager();
00460         ~KviIconManager();
00461 private:
00462         QPixmap                     * m_smallIcons[KVI_NUM_SMALL_ICONS];
00463         KviIconWidget               * m_pIconWidget;
00464 
00465         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviCachedPixmap>      * m_pCachedImages;
00466         KviPointerHashTable<QString,int>                  * m_pIconNames;
00467         unsigned int                  m_uCacheTotalSize;
00468         unsigned int                  m_uCacheMaxSize;
00469 public:
00470         // WARNING: Don't store this pointer!
00471         // id == filename | number that indicates an internal pixmap
00472         // 0 stands for "any"
00473         QPixmap * getImage(const QString &id,bool bCanBeNumber = true,QString* pRetPath = 0);
00474 
00475         // The returned pointer is owned by the icon manager
00476         // and can be deleted at any time : so don't store it
00477         KviCachedPixmap * getPixmapWithCache(const QString &szName);
00478 
00479         // The returned pointer is owned by the icon manager
00480         // and can be deleted at any time : so don't store it
00481         KviCachedPixmap * getPixmapWithCacheScaleOnLoad(const QString &szName,int iMaxWidth,int iMaxHeight);
00482 
00483         // The returned pointer is owned by the icon manager
00484         // and can be deleted at any time : so don't store it
00485         QPixmap * getPixmap(const QString &szName)
00486                 { KviCachedPixmap * p = getPixmapWithCache(szName); return p ? p->pixmap() : 0; };
00487 
00488         // this one never fails... if the image can't be found
00489         // a default 32x32 image is returned
00490         QPixmap * getBigIcon(const QString &szName);
00491 
00492         // this one never fails... if the icon isn't there
00493         // then a default 16x16 image is returned
00494         QPixmap * getSmallIcon(int idx){ return idx < KVI_NUM_SMALL_ICONS ? (m_smallIcons[idx] ? m_smallIcons[idx] : loadSmallIcon(idx) ) : 0; };

00505         KviAvatar * getAvatar(const QString &szLocalPath,const QString &szName);
